r.s: Provides faster json decoding through simdjson bindings for PHP
r.d: Provides faster json decoding through simdjson bindings for PHP (Single Instruction, Multiple Data)
r.n: * Reuse PHP's 1-byte and 0-byte interned strings in simdjson_decode, reducing memory usage for those strings. (e.g. for the key/value in '{"x":""}') * Return correct count in simdjson_key_count. Properly return counts larger than 0xFFFFFF instead of returning 0xFFFFFF.
